# Playground

```{r}
# Install and load the htmlTable library
install.packages("htmlTable")
library(htmlTable)

# Sample data for the table
data <- data.frame(
  Name = c("John", "Alice", "Bob"),
  Age = c(25, 30, 28),
  Occupation = c("Engineer", "Doctor", "Teacher")
)

# Create the HTML table
html_table <- htmlTable(data, align = "c", caption = "Sample Table", col.rgroup = c("lightblue"))

# Print the HTML table
cat(html_table)
```
